title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 4 Carretera Cádiz Variante
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 4 Carretera Cádiz Variante
description: It is the aquamijas parking lot, we have slept because we had the tickets for the park and we took advantage of the night to stay early. It is next to the highway but we slept very well, at night there is not so much movement. There was more camper and AC when we arrived, and no one has come to ask us. There is a sign that warns that at the opening of the park is only for customers, so it should only be used for the night.

title: (29651) Fuengirola - 7 Calle Roble
description: Parking next to carrefour gas station right next to it. Dirt floor and very flat, quiet to spend the night with many parking spaces.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 2 Terreno Parque Fluvial Sohail
description: Restaurant parking closed. Shaded and 20 min / 30 from the center and marine activities.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 8 Calle Méndez Núñez
description: Next to a school so there may be some noise during school hours. Ideal with children, because it has the park in front of the stories. Shopping center and promenade. On Fridays around 3pm they have celebrations in the Mosque next to the parking, and on Sundays they have a market on the street from 9am-3pm, but you can still park in some areas of the parking lot.

title: (29651) Mijas - 21 Via Sup R1 el Acebedo
title_short: (29651) Mijas - 21 Via Sup R1 el Acebedo
description: Rustic camper stop, with all basic equipment. Showers, electric 16A. Site adjacent to restaurant/bar with WiFi, if you park nearby. Run by an enterprising young Norwegian. Easy walk to Fuengirola and the beach

title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 48 Arrabal L2
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 48 Arrabal L2
description: Esplanade of land with a slight slope in some parts, it is not a great place, but to spend a night without problem

title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 50 Camino de Campanales
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 50 Camino de Campanales
description: Ample free parking meters from Fuengirola and 20 minutes by bus to Mijas Pueblo. Quiet and safe. Bus 8 minutes walk to stop M-122 that leaves Las Cañadas.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 158 Calle Recinto Ferial
description: Parking near centre of town

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 53 Avenida Ramón y Cajal
description: Public washing machines at the Repsol petrol station.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 14 Calle Alberto Morgenstern
description: Normal beach parking with public toilet closeby.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 8 Calle San Pedro
description:
Market Square, Tuesdays and Saturdays large crowd wg. Market. Plenty of restaurants all around and towards the beach (300-400 m).
So far mostly Scandinavians here.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 2 Calle Real
description: Washing with a pressure gun. It has a platform to reach the top of your AC.

title: (29651) Fuengirola - 99 Calle Río Guadalteba
description: Big dirt parking lot.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 0 Calle Alberto Morgenstern
description: Day parking. very pleasant, next to the river and the sea. beaches with good access.

title: (29640) Fuengirola -
description: Parking from Miramar Shopping Mall!  No service.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 54 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
title_short: (29640) Fuengirola - 54 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
description: Laundry room - 3 washers and 2 dryers.

title: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 0 Camino de Campanales
title_short: (29651) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 0 Camino de Campanales
description: Free open space for parking large vehicles such as  motorhomes. there are almost always some parked around.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 19-21 Calle Jineta
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 19-21 Calle Jineta
description: Free parking with beautiful view and next to a walking path, nice to do. Very calm but with a lot of wind.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 1 Avenida Mare Nostrum
description: This is a great location! Right by the castle and park. You pay the man in the kiosk when you arrive. It is near the road but it was a great place for one night as we were passing through.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1G Urbanización la Ponderosa
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1G Urbanización la Ponderosa
description: Quiet place to spend the night and the day. People pass walking, doing sports or a car. Visit at night from various wild boars, but otherwise very peaceful and quiet. several level sites

title: (29649) Fuengirola - 4 Avenida Mare Nostrum
description: Petrol station with very friendly staff. They can fill gas cylinders of any type. They also have many accessories for different bottles. Recommend

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 7 Avenida Dulcinea
description: Repsol station with LPG. Very good reception, help for the connection if necessary.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Prado Marina
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Prado Marina
description: Nice, guite place, with beatufull view on the city, about 10minutes walking to the beach. Can stay throught the night with a regular car

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 112 Avenida de los Boliches
description: On the bridge of Av. De los Boliches can be parked and stood in and out of town. There are no defined parking spaces so it is also possible for longer vehicles. Not particularly nice but close to the center. Had our bus standing there for three days when we were in town.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 20 Calle Alcalá Galiano
description: Parking possible day and night. 2 minute walk to the main street with bakery and restaurants.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 24 Carretera Cádiz Variante
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 24 Carretera Cádiz Variante
description: This is only a park place near the beach. Beautiful views. Better for the big RV.

title: (29649) Chaparral - 10M Urbanizacion Sol del
description: Quiet place, although the highway is relatively close, you hardly hear it, plenty of space to park. The beach is just 80 meters away, with crystal clear water, great for snorkeling, you have to go through the highway through an underpass. Even last night we had several times the visit of a wild boar.

title: (29649) - 7N Arrabal Hipodromo Costa del Sol
description: Free large and level parking. Quiet.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 25 Avenida Torreblanca
description: Parking parallel to the sidewalk, large motorhomes enter.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 125 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
title_short: (29640) Fuengirola - 125 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
description: Line parking on the road overlooking and near the beach.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 11 Urbanización Cerrado del Aguila
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 11 Urbanización Cerrado del Aguila
description: Super cool location. Lots of peace and a beautiful view.

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 0 Avenida Carvajal
description: Parking along both sides of the road. Easy access to beach

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 6 Calle El Chopo de Cosmópolis
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 6 Calle El Chopo de Cosmópolis
description: Quiet parking to spend day and night ..... in front of the beach with beach bar and shower

title: (29650) Mijas - 11T Urbanizacion el Maro
description:
Esplanade between the mountains and with great views of the sea.
very calm.
highly recommended.

title: (29650) Mijas - 50V Urbanización Torreblanca del Sol
description: Large dirt square in the middle of the hills below Mijas. Reachable via dirt roads in good condition, which can also be traveled by non-4x4 vehicles. Very quiet, there are no houses close by

title: (29640) Fuengirola - 154 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
title_short: (29640) Fuengirola - 154 Paseo Marítimo Rey de España
description: At the front line of the beach. Showers every 20 meters, in front of the cybercafe cafeteria there is a toilet 24h. For vehicles till 5 meter allowed.

title: (29650) Mijas - 21B Urbanización Torreblanca del Sol
description: Nice views, next to the discgolf park

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Arrabal Sector 13
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Arrabal Sector 13
description: Large parking under shady trees keeps temperature down, quiet at night safe one night stay. Next to restaurant and mercadona supermarket down the hill. Stones throw to La Cala town centre.

title: (29649) - 7R Arrabal Sup C23
description: Parking strip in a dead end street .. quiet .. ideal for camper with trailer because the great location for motorhomes next door is forbidden to caravans (so vehicle with trailer) .. Supply and waste disposal on the site for caravans 400 meters further.

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 16 Calle Torreón
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 16 Calle Torreón
description: Nice, quiet and illuminated parking space right on the beach! Passable only for vehicles up to 3.5 tons! We stood there for a day and a night and had no problems! There are showers on the beach in the immediate vicinity, as well as toilets! However, these are locked at night! Good restaurants and bars right nearby!

title: (29650) Mijas - 11 Camino de los Caños
description: Parking on the other side of Plaza Virgen de la Peña.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal Ue C9
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal Ue C9
description: Gas station with LPG. shop, bread. car wash station, compressed air.

title: (29650) Mijas - 8 Carretera Coín
description: It is already along the road very close to the center

title: (29650) Mijas - s/n Avenida del Compás
description: Water point down the Ermita Virgen de la Pena. Parking spaces nearby. Facing the miniature museum.

title: (29650) Mijas - 8D Avenida del Compás
description: Big limit !!! FOR NORMAL VANS ONLY. Parking hall in the center "Mijas Pueblo". Easily accessible by car. Steep hill. For the day only

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 5C Arrabal Sg C5
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 5C Arrabal Sg C5
description: Exhibition center, Mijas Bay. Quiet and safe, just ten minutes from the beach. Ideal for walks along the Calahonda waterfront and to the island of Marbella. Large flat concrete carpark.

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: It is a public, free and small car park published in a viewpoint. Our vehicle is six meters long and it has entered just right, for campers it is ideal, you do have to be very lucky to find a space.

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: Small parking lot without problem to sleep in front of public parking 8 spaces

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Avenida Abogados de Oficio
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 4 Avenida Abogados de Oficio
description: Water

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: Just a tiny pull of on this beautiful road on the side of the Mijas mountain. Only room for 1 van, maybe 2. It’s right next to the road so not so quite, but amazing for a morning coffee or a lunch. Amazing view.

title: (29650) Mijas - 11D Calle Tamisa
description: Free parking 2 minutes walk from the center of Mijas, very little crowded and flat. We spent one night there and it was very good.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 13 Avenida Barcelona
description: Quiet day and night parking

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 28 Calle Butibamba
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 28 Calle Butibamba
description: Shower. Also in operation in winter.

title: (29650) Mijas - 123 Carretera Mijas-Fuengirola
description: Free water point and paid laundry place for campers.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal C13
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Arrabal C13
description: Gas station with free water point.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Jardín Butiplaya
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 1 Urbanización Jardín Butiplaya
description: Laundromat, very well maintained!

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 3 Calle Rododendro
description: Parking near a Tibetan pagoda with views over Benalmadena

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 53P Calle del Mejicano
description: Parking next to the beach and quiet

title: (29631) Benalmádena - Calle Heliotropo
description: Free parking right at the Buddhist stupa in Benalmadena. Wonderful view of the building, the city and the sea. Buddhists say that this place is very powerful and suitable for making good wishes. During the opening hours of approx. 10- 19 (siesta from 14-16) o'clock the stupa can also be visited, as well as the toilet are used. The butterfly park also invites you to visit. Small sports field and playground for the children.

title: (29650) Mijas - 8 Via Ue S24 el Cerrajon
title_short: (29650) Mijas - 8 Via Ue S24 el Cerrajon
description: Nice parking for 3 or 4 caravans, nice sunsets and right in front of hiking trails.

title: (29650) Mijas - 14 Urbanización Huerta Alta I
description: Parking with bus shuttle from 12 to 01 for Mijas super large parking 200 or more vehicles of all kinds.

title: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 2A Urbanización las Mimosas
title_short: (29649) Las Lagunas de Mijas - 2A Urbanización las Mimosas
description:
Parking along the highway, so it's noisy. But if your here for a couple of hours of skimboarding or surfing it's a good place to stay.

If your coming in from the highway there is no height restriction. But if your come via the side road and under the highway the hight is 2.70m

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 5 Calle Muerdago
description: Water fountain with enough pressure for filling. located inside the playground. Water bottles necessary.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 102 Avenida de la Torre
description: Illuminated parking off the highway next to the hotel. Walk down to the beach.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 59 Avenida Retamar
description: Ample place to park. Near the town, the stupa and the butterfly farm. Very quiet area with no slope on this straight. We spent the night without problem

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 1P Avenida Retamar
description: Right in front of the Castello de Colomares and therefore perfect for sightseeing.

title: (29650) Mijas - 6J Carretera Coín
description: Van parking area. Flat, nice view. Be careful, take the lower path and go back up the esplanade in reverse.

title: (29631) Benalmádena -
description: Parking for day and night very quiet night, next to the road entering the urbanization

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 22P Terreno SP-9 Cala de la Higuera
title_short: (29631) Benalmádena - 22P Terreno SP-9 Cala de la Higuera
description: Parking with beautiful views and quiet

address.street: 22P Terreno SP-9 Cala de la Higuera

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 1T Terreno SP-11 la Viñuela
description: The closest I have managed to park from the castle of Colomares with a 7-seater motorhome

title: (29650) Mijas -
description: Quiet spot in the large car park at the end of the road. A beautiful view and the beginning of a number of hiking and mountain biking trails. There's also a former quarry, now lined with trees, where we saw a deer. These are the hills where James Bond flew the gyrocopter Little Nellie in You Only Live Twice!

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 45 Avenida de la Vista
description: Big public parking lot with waste containers. Not very special place but useful place to leave car when visiting town.

title: (29649) Calahonda - 165 Calle Olivo
description: Self-service laundry, washing and drying, all included.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 73-81 Avenida del Sol
description: It is a parking small spot just off the N 340, Has 5 Spaces in Benalmadena, between the best hotel Benalmadena and the torrequebrada. There is a sign for a restaurant called La Cala. There is always some AC parked and there are usually no problems as long as you take nothing out. Lovely views of the sea and close to a super and gas station

title: (29649) Calahonda - 27 Calle San Wenceslao de Calypso
title_short: (29649) Calahonda - 27 Calle San Wenceslao de Calypso
description: Easily accessible washing machine from the road with parking that is usually overcrowded in high season. Rest of the year no problem. Supermarket very close.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 7 Terreno SP-8 Santangelo Oeste
description: Very quiet place in the upper parts of urbanizations. Plenty of parking, garbage nearby and a very quiet area. At the back there is a bridge that leads to the mountain with different paths, views of part of Benalmádena.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 52 Carretera Cádiz
description: Free parking 100 m from the beach.

name: Camping Los Jarales
title: (29649) Camping Los Jarales
description:
Campsite Los Jarales in Mijas Costa. The squares of approximately 60m2 are all equipped with water and electricity. There is a playground and in the summer a swimming pool. Showers and toilets in good condition. Two washing machines available, no dryer.
Wi-Fi. Dogs are welcome.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - Nº 6 Calle Pepa Guerra Valdenebro
title_short: (29631) Benalmádena - Nº 6 Calle Pepa Guerra Valdenebro
description: Very clean and comfortable laundromat. Owners were very friendly as well.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 35 Calle Andrómeda
description: Free parking next to the Tivoli. Friday morning closed for flea market. Very spacious

title: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 70 Avenida de España
title_short: (29649) La Cala de Mijas - 70 Avenida de España
description: A public parking lot next to a park with a children's playground. The sea is a 3-minute walk away, Lidl is a 2-minute walk away and various restaurants are just a stone's throw away. Lots of shade, many parked cars during the day, but completely empty and quiet at night. We slept here for 2 nights without any problems

name: Área de Autocaravanas Benalmádena | Dr. Lorenzo Valderrama
title: (29630) Área de Autocaravanas Benalmádena | Dr. Lorenzo Valderrama
title_short: (29630) Área de Autocaravanas Benalmádena | Dr. Lorenzo Valderrama
description: Free camper place for max 72 hours, often full, with water change service. Beach 500 meters away. Parking and restaurant nearby. It is forbidden to set up tables and chairs.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 112 Avenida Antonio Machado
description: M3 Petroleum gas station with drinking water to fill the clean water tank. Very friendly and cheaper gasoline

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 7 Avenida de Rocío Jurado
description: Row parking, street side (south possible for a 6-7 meters) drinking water in the park, toilet and children's play module that is really worth the trip. Access to the municipal swimming pool at 5 minutes on foot, mercadona at 5 minutes and repsol laundry at 200m.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 2 Avenida Gamonal
description: Lacolada laundromat - washing possible up to 40 degrees, according to the owner, the detergent contains disinfectant so that the washing does not have to be hotter. Operation of the machines in several languages (also German). Super clean, new machines and owners right next door (iHomes properties)

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 6 Avenida Federico García Lorca
description: It is the Pueblo Quinta car park. In winter it is very quiet. Very central, with a nice walk to the marina, La Carihuela and Torremolinos. Beach and restaurant area.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - Av. Federico Garcia Lorca
description: Long parking for 6-meter motorhomes

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 1 Avenida Gamonal
description: Launderette SpeedQueen - washing possible up to 90 degrees - 6 washing machines, 4 dryers - detergent is already included. Not very clean, washing machines need a thorough cleaning. Washing up to 90 degrees is possible.

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 17 Avenida Federico García Lorca
description: Repsol gas station. Exchange of gas bottles. No LPG. Cafe area. Washing machines and tumble dryers. Extra washing machine for pet items.

title: (29604) Marbella -
description: Parking next to Cabo pino, facing the beach.

title: (29630) - 9P Terreno SP-2 Santangelo Norte
description: Very quiet high area, with many streets without problem to park and far from the houses. There are several tourist trails a few meters away.

title: (29604) Marbella - 272 Urbanización Jardines del Puerto
description: Laundromat at the Shell petrol station. 3 x 8 kg 2 x 14 kg 4 x dryer All 30 minutes each. Coins are required, which are available at the gas station. See photo for prices.

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 39 Urbanizacion UR9
description: An easily accessible large plateau on a hill. Directly at the Castillo histórico alhaurin el grande. Please collect some garbage! There are a lot of shards and mirror splinters lying around that could cause a fire...

name: Camping Cabopino
title: (29604) Camping Cabopino
description: Marbella, Urbanization Artola Alta 4. Cabopino Camping

title: (29604) Marbella - 1N Urbanización Cabopino
description: Free public parking right on the beach next to a beautiful nature reserve. Beware, there is a scam on the way, who wants to collect parking fees. Don't pay!!! Longer stays are NOT allowed. On weekends the parking lot is packed.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 10 Calle Andres Segovia
description: Quiet and shady car park, in the upper part of the city, closed-end street. No service

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Cafeteria called "Cafestore" where, apart from food, they offer showers. The beach is very close. It is expensive. No LPG/Autogas here

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 43 A-404
description: Spacious parking close to bakeries, mountains and where you can leave your motorhome

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - A-404
description: Nice spot for a day or night at the start of many hikes and great downhill/enduro mountain biking. Further up is another spot but takes more climbing on gravel. Disadvantages: close to a shooting range, so during the day you hear them. Close to the street but very quiet at night. Perfect to quickly park and do a big hike. The owners of the restaurants uphill are super friendly and no problem to refill water if you ask. Spot probably not available in the weekend because it gets very busy than.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 7V Urbanizacion SUPR1. 1
description: Just a parking lot. Quiet and lots of space

title: (29630) Benalmádena - 20 Avenida de la Encina
description: It is a place where vehicles pass a one-way street, we spend the night and the beach goes down very well at 300 meters. Bars of drinks at 5 minutes walk.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Gas station where it is possible to spend the night. Wifi open and free at the cafeteria. There is a shower 3,50euros at the cafeteria also. Step to remember if you have no choice because the proximity of the fast lane ensures a sleepless night!

title: (29630) Benalmádena - C. La Fragata
description: Paid parking at the marina. No signs prohibiting RVs.

title: (29604) Marbella -
description: A good and quiet place to spend the night

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 38A Urbanizacion UR11
description: Excellent starting point for visiting the river in the canyon with pools of water "barranco blanco"

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 29 Urbanizacion UR9
description: Large and quiet car park, nice views, the noise from the road can be heard very lightly. It looks like a kind of maze, you can drive even further down. It appears to be under construction with open manhole covers here and there, so drive carefully. There is a forest on the other side of the road where you can go for a walk. 30 minutes from Málaga.

title: () Marbella - Unnamed Road
description: Potable source, exceptional pressure and easy access road. It's not in the area at all, but still a nice area to wander around.

title: (29631) Benalmádena - 1 Calle La Fragata
description: Laundry

name: Camping Málaga Monte Parc
title: (29130) Camping Málaga Monte Parc
description:
Welcome to Camping Málaga Monte Parc.

We are located in Alhaurín de la Torre, found on the outskirts on the A404. 20KM away from Málaga Centro.

We are an in-land campsite, "en el campo", but local items include Alhaurín de la Torre and Alhaurín el Grande, both a 5 minute drive away. Lauro Golf is around the corner 5 minutes away, with Málaga Centro being easily accessible with a 20 minute drive. The beach is also around 15km away, with Los Alamos and Playa Guadalhorce being the closest.

We require a 3 night minimum stay however it is possible to stay 1-2 nights but there is a 20% supplement. 

For any further information, please consult our website or call us.

address.city: Alhaurín de la Torre, Arroyo Hondo S/N

title: (29604) Marbella - 8 Urbanización Carib Playa
description:
A parking right in front of the sea. 
parking tranquilo fuera de temporada de verano. al lado de un restaurante

title: (29130) Pinos de Alhaurín - 55D Calle Manuel Aleixandre
title_short: (29130) Pinos de Alhaurín - 55D Calle Manuel Aleixandre
description: Good place to spend the night. Next to Venta Vázquez. Where you can have breakfast before going out to cycle in the mountains or hiking.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 29 Calle Madre Teresa de Calcuta
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 29 Calle Madre Teresa de Calcuta
description: Parking at the foot of the urbanization and polygon...quiet...

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 2 Calle Gonzalez Madrid
title_short: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 2 Calle Gonzalez Madrid
description: Big levelled parking close to Guardia Civil, the Theatre and back intrance of Mercadona. Fleamarket Thursday Morning (parking not allowed then). Passing Traffic limited to 40 km/h.

title: (29604) Marbella - 454A Urbanización Marbesa
description: Large parking without any service. Places shared with those of the Simbad restaurant. Direct access to the beach. Sign at the entrance with no transit for work vehicles (light vehicles) more than 5m.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 5 Calle Decano Juan de Espino
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 5 Calle Decano Juan de Espino
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Near the beach and various services.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 14K Costa de la Carihuela
description: Small place but close to the beach

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 7 Calle Salvador Allende
description: Place in Carihuela Beach. Calm. Dead end.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle Subida al Cerro del Toril
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle Subida al Cerro del Toril
description: Very quiet street in a residential area and further from the highway, so there is no noise. CC Carrefour nearby and beach 20mn on foot.

address.street: 3 Calle Subida al Cerro del Toril

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Calle Decano Fdez. y Maqueda
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Calle Decano Fdez. y Maqueda
description: It is a fairly large outdoor open space, next to the train tracks and the Benalmádena-Torremolinos road ... very quiet and peaceful place to spend the night

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle del Remo
description: Close to the beach, bars and restaurants. Just for the day. Ok for a van but large campers would have difficulty manoeuvring. Busy on weekends. Beach showers and toilets nearby. Some bars have free wifi.

title: (29604) Marbella - 15 Avenida Marbella del Este
description: Large, spacious parking lot with shade, only some noise from the road

name: Andes el Grande
title: (29120) Andes el Grande
description: Andes El Grande is a hostel / airbnb / camper place where you can enjoy hostel life, but still sleep in your camper. You can use internet, shower, toilets, swimming pool, etc. for €15/night. Andes El Grande is a magical place, recommended!

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 33 Ramal del Carmelo
description: Day parking next to the Battery park. hours from 9:30 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. with doors closing. No services. Quiet parking area during the day next to a large and colorful park, ideal for disconnecting and taking a walk with the family.

title: (29604) Marbella - 3 Rancho Park
description: Day parking on the beach, with beautiful sea views, close to beach bars. The beach has a bit of rock, but that's fine.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 7 Calle Periodista Federico Alba
description: Large parking lot next to the company Aguas de Torremolinos. It is a quiet area near Aqualand which also has fairly flat areas. The beach is quite far. There are services like supermarkets or bars nearby.

title: (29604) Marbella - 29 Avenida Valeriano Rodríguez
description: Ideal medium quiet parking campers supermarkets bars etc at 1 minute, seems safe

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 6 Calle Pedro Navarro Bruna
description: Free parking next to sports facilities (they have bathrooms) and Auditorium. We have been only one night (Saturday). Incredible, without any noise, maximum tranquility. I understand that other weekends if there are sporting events it will be full of cars. There are more than 60 places. The sports facilities are open to the public for use, both outdoors and covered pavilion.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Avenida San Anton
description: Nice parking, next to the forest picnic/grill area, very quiet, acces to the drinkable water with minerals, also just next to the stadion public showers and toilets :) There is like sport area with swimming pools, football, tennis. Also 15min from the city and beach. There is many free parking around so you can fine your favorite. We stayed here 5 nights, without problem, had grill and using the showers.

title: (29604) Marbella - 1H Urbanización Calle Ciudad de los Periodistas
title_short: (29604) Marbella - 1H Urbanización Calle Ciudad de los Periodistas
description: A really quiet parking, perfect to rest

address.street: 1H Urbanización Calle Ciudad de los Periodistas

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 15 Calle Decano Higueras del Castillo
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 15 Calle Decano Higueras del Castillo
description: Simple parking, but close to the sea and the nightlife. Parking (abusive?) During the day. Only for cars and vans of medium size. No camper> 6m very busy

title: (29604) Marbella - 1 Urbanización Marbella del Este
description: Small Parking Area directly on the beach. Cold Showers on  the beach available. Public Toilets are closed in off season. these place is maybe better for smaller vans.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Carril de los Manantiales
description: Large parking lot next to the beautiful picnic area. Lots of traffic but check! Peaceful area.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 1 Zona Ur-es-02
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 1 Zona Ur-es-02
description: Along a park with games for children, near the center of Alhaurin de la Torre, accessible on foot. address: Av. Mar. Cantabrico

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 251 Avenida San Anton
description: Clean drinking water and deposit for grey water

title: (29604) Marbella - 4 Conjunto White Pearl Beach
description: Parking near the sea with shower to rinse off

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1V Calle Castillo del Inglés
description: Spacious, beautiful, relaxed parking in residential area. 5 minutes from city center. Beautiful view of the ocean right next to it. Also a little plaza with trees and benches. No amenities.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Camino de los Pinares
description: Picnic area with water taps and barbeques. Very popular amongst the locals so it can be noicy.

title: (29604) Marbella - 5 Conjunto White Pearl Beach
description: Parking by the sea. With toilet, shower

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Calle Castillo del Inglés
description: Quiet area to park and spend the night.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Camino de los Pinares
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Camino de los Pinares
description: Drinking water

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 1 Calle Ur14 Manantiales Altos
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 1 Calle Ur14 Manantiales Altos
description: Quiet parking

title: (29604) Marbella - 48D Urbanización Real de Zaragoza
description: Quiet parking near the beach.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 14 Calle Cuba
description: Parking next to Aqualand Torremolinos. There is a little spot next to Aqualand parking which is free, just don't park to aqualand parking.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 5 Calle San Miguel
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 5 Calle San Miguel
description: Laundromat very practical there is even a washing machine for dog blankets

title: (29620) Torremolinos - Av. Isabel Manoja, 2
description: Super laundry written in French and English not too expensive , there is wifi and a socket.

title: (29100) Málaga - 181 Lugar Partido Valdeperales
description: In the middle of a large forest, surrounded by pine trees, next to a football stadium. Very quiet at night. Along the GR 249. No facilities, but there is a water point at the entrance to the stadium. There is plenty of space to park. Be careful, do not follow the GPS here because it indicates closed or impassable paths by van or CC. On the MA-3303, south of the interchange with the A-355, take the small road towards "Nacimiento" and "Ciudad Deportivo". The 3rd path on the left leads to the "Ciudad Deportivo", but the official path, with a sign at the crossroads, is further: continue on the small road following the signs "Ciudad Deportivo" There is a mountain bike center nearby and tracks in the woods. Also a riding place near Nacimiento.

title: (29604) Marbella - 1 Calle Picasso
description: Nice parking really quiet even in July-August. But be discreet and do not go out chairs or towels. Lidl at 5 minutes. by bike. Showers, deckchairs and small snack / bar (closes at 22:30 in high season) Ideal for a van.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Avenida de los Manantiales
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - s/n Avenida de los Manantiales
description:
Laundry. Self-service. Detergent including.
2 * 8 kg washers for 3 EUR, 30 minutes at 40° C
3 * 14 kg washers for 5 EUR
3 * 14 kg dryers for 1 EUR, 10 minutes (30 minutes recommend at highest temperature).
Wi-Fi, security camera. Inside the SuperSol supermarket. Open only when supermarket is open. Table and chairs.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle México
description: Gravel parking, is located above, overlooking the sea, no service !!

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 11 Calle Río Aranda
description:
Self service laundry, extremely clean.
washing 12kg, 20kg, dryers 12kg, 18kg for 20mins

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 15 Avenida Isaac Peral
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 15 Avenida Isaac Peral
description: Good place to spend the night near Sierra Cártama

title: (29620) Torremolinos -
description: Mixed paved car park with marked lines, close to the center of Torremolinos. SUPECO, LIDL and ALDI at 200m.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 16 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 16 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: Fairground ideal for visiting the town

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 16 Calle Boscán
description: Free public parking open from 8h to 22h convenient for visiting the city center

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 1 Ronda Alta de Benyamina
description:
Parking with a little unevenness, it is very close to the beach. with restaurant and supermarkets nearby. gas station 200 meters.
night and day no problem
no services

title: (29130) Málaga - 6M Terreno Ur
description: Nothing special. Industrial estate but very open and nicer than others I've had to sleep in. good coverage and savings to walk a little with the dog. Quiet night even on a Friday night. no services

title: (29604) Marbella - 69 Conjunto Ciudad Residencial Tiempo Libre
title_short: (29604) Marbella - 69 Conjunto Ciudad Residencial Tiempo Libre
description: A large, slightly sloping gravel car park with sea views. The beach is less than a 5-minute walk away. In the surroundings (about 600 m) you will find a Mercandona with toilet, a Lidl and, in the opposite direction, a service station with laundry and toilet. We also discovered a German speaking veterinarian around the corner because we wanted to continue in Morocco. I stayed a week and had no problem. I felt safe and it was still very hot in early November.

title: (29604) Marbella - 2 Urbanización Pinomar
description: A gas station with a self service laundry. Also a car wash and an ATM.

title: (29604) Marbella - 202 Urbanización Alvarito Playa
description: Free parking, not very quiet in the summer, a few meters from the beach

title: (29604) Marbella - 1 Urbanización Alvarito Playa
description: New car park. 200 m from the sea. 10 parking spaces. right.

title: (29604) Marbella - 67-87 Urbanización Alvarito Playa
description: Small car park, very close to the other, more horizontal.

title: (29604) Marbella -
description: Pine forest next to the Buganvilla campsite, in Marbella, 3 min from the beach, lots of shade, no services

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - Sn Avenida Ciudad de Ceuta
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - Sn Avenida Ciudad de Ceuta
description: Parking in Lidl supermarket next to gas station

name: Camping La Buganvilla
title: (29604) Camping La Buganvilla
description:
Marbella, Autovia del Mediterraneo.
Camping La Buganvilla 1 km from the beach and 6 km from the center of Marbella. Very nice campsite with swimming pool. free wifi at the bar

We settled in this campsite
for two nights. a little expensive for the place because the pitches are not really flat and we have to take the 4 lanes to access Marbella.
Impossible when cycling.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 1 Camino Angostura de la Capellania
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 1 Camino Angostura de la Capellania
description: Parking with some shade, near a low cost gas station. I think it may be fine also for summer.

title: (29100) Coín - 64 Terreno SUP.R.18
description: Large gravelled car park. Good for the night.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 23 Calle del Sanatorio
description: Parking on the street. Usually buses are also parked there. About 300 m from the beach. A few bars nearby

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 15 Zona Ue-en-03
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 15 Zona Ue-en-03
description: Free (non-potable) water, free air for wheels.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 85 Calle Corelli
description: Very quiet parking lot to spend the night

title: (29604) Marbella - 17 Avenida Andasol
description: Small asphalt or ground parking with public shower and a chiringuito next door. There is a problem at the end of the street, right on the beach is prohibited the circulation of vehicles and parking, but in the street that leads to the beach, in the urbanizations if you can park, although as you get closer to the beach the unevenness is very pronounced.

title: (29100) Miralmonte -
description: Our Wonder Casa Rural La Alegría is the ideal place where you can spend the night or several nights. Located in a privileged natural environment surrounded by nature, just 10 minutes from a shopping center (Carrefour, cinemas, etc.) and 30 minutes from the beach, airport and the tourist center of Malaga. The house has a large outdoor parking area. The private pool available throughout the year is located in a large garden with a barbecue area and a large outdoor space to enjoy. (Trampoline, basketball basket, sun loungers...) We have a washing machine and drying rack for the traveler who needs to clean their clothes with a supplement of 5 euros. Just as they can use the shower to clean themselves if they need to with an extra 3 euros. Welcome (elderly, adults, youth, adolescents, children and babies) to our rural house. Send an email to check availability.

title: (29130) - 3C Terreno Ur
description: Quiet place, but without services. Good to spend a night. You can go mountain biking and trail runing around. There is an Aldi at 100m

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 10 Avenida Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: Self-service laundry

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre -
description: Las Americas gas station laundromat

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 11 Paseo Marítimo
description: Parking in front of the valid sea off season. forbidden only for small vans RV.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 3 Calle Parroco Florencio Aguilar
description: Excellent parking to spend the night or to leave the motorhome and leave to know the city, very close to Malaga. Quiet zone

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 60 Calle Santa Barbara
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 60 Calle Santa Barbara
description: Large parking bay in a quiet residential street.  Good place to stop overnight if you have a large motorhome. Good dog walking area alongside the road. Aldi & petrol station just up the road

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 5 Calle del Sanatorio
description: Maritime hospital parking. It is a quiet clearing 200 meters from the beach. You can use the showers and toilets on the beach. There are many beach bars and entertainment areas nearby. You can sleep without problem, although there are many parrots and they do not shut up as soon as they light up. Otherwise, nobody bothered us.

title: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 146 Urbanización Sierra Gorda
title_short: (29120) Alhaurín el Grande - 146 Urbanización Sierra Gorda
description:
A dead end street away from houses, overlooking an amazing view 360 degrees around.

No services except for the spectacular view. Take your trash with you.

No parking forbidden signs anywhere.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 15R Paseo de Maritimo Torremolinos
description: Park up on the beach. Toilets opposite. Quite busy

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 15K Paseo Marítimo
description:
Only for smaller vans allowed. Nerby hotel, but very quiet place off-season. If you come after 8p.m. and leave before 9a.m. you can stay for free, otherwise you´ll pay at least 1 euro per day. 
Nice view on the sea, lot´s of space. It´s possible to take a "shower" at the beach.

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 14 Calle Diego Franco Cantos
description: Parking in a dead end, 200m from the beach, opposite a small park and a children's play area

title: (29620) Torremolinos - 78 Avenida de Manuel Fraga Iribarne
title_short: (29620) Torremolinos - 78 Avenida de Manuel Fraga Iribarne
description: Self-service laundry 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Buy tokens at the Repsol garage. 4x8kg machines plus one for pet items 3x14kg machines and 4 dryers. Washing takes about 1 hour, tumble drying 30 minutes. I used the 80% warm option for bedding, 60% medium for clothes

title: (29100) Coín - 1Z Camino Huertas Viejas
description: Solar used to park, next to the Civil Guard barracks, near the urban center.

title: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 9 Zona Ue-Pa-02
title_short: (29130) Alhaurín de la Torre - 9 Zona Ue-Pa-02
description: Pressure car wash for vehicles up to 3.10 m high, with a gun for tires and a platform on one side for better access to the roof. It works with coins and has a coin exchange machine.

title: (29604) Marbella - 4 Pl de los Tamarindos
description: Parking for day and night quiet next to the beach

name: Camping Torremolinos
title: (29620) Camping Torremolinos
description: Far to expensive at €40 a night for 2 adults with electric. Campsite as no swimming pool, restaurant or bar. Maybe this is why they can justify charging this price.

title: (29100) Coín - 1 Calle Guttenberg
description: Free parking for campers and caravans in the Cantarranas industrial area. The site has toilet cistern emptying, sewage disposal and water supply. The residual waste containers are located on the road above the parking lot towards the main road and on the road leading to the depot. Four supermarkets are on their way to the city within 900 meters. The city center and the "La Trocha" shopping center are both 1.5 km away.

title: (29100) Coín - 2A Avenida Reina Sofía
description: Laundrette at the Repsol garage. Small parking spaces so perhaps use car park immediately below garage.

title: (29100) Coín - Carretera de Monda
description: Ample parking area in the center of town, with easy access to bars, restaurants and supply stores less than 5 min walk. Dirt floor, lots of dust. Quiet place to sleep during the week; bad place for holidays or weekends because you hear a lot of noise from the pub next door.

title: (29100) Coín - 2 Calle Guadalquivir
description: Laundromat, gas Repsol and Cespa

title: (29140) Málaga - 24 Carretera de Álora
description: Ideal parking with bars and restaurants. Park for children next.

title: (29004) Torremolinos - 20K Paseo de Maritimo Torremolinos
description: Large free parking in gravel and grass without services. The entrance is in front of the Mata Mura restaurant accessible in this season. a little noisy during the day by planes

title: (29600) Marbella -
description: CÁDIZ address service area with ample specific parking for trucks and motorhomes. Restaurant / cafeteria, ideal to stop for lunch, have a coffee or stretch your legs, very friendly staff.

title: (29100) Coín - 1 Calle Clara Campoamor
description: Very wide parking near the city centre. A little next to the road, but you can park more inside. No facilities, but very nice!

title: (29603) Marbella - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Service area with large parking lots and restaurant

title: () Ojén - Unnamed Road
description: Nice spot at almost 1000m altitude with a great panoramic view of the sea and the mountains. Located at the foot of a high voltage line. The slopes to go up there are very very steep.

title: (29004) Torremolinos - Paseo de Maritimo Torremolinos
description: Authorized parking along the beach, possibility for ten motorhomes, beach shower, calm nights, no problem, beware the only one parking still accessible, not limited by a bar, the Guardia often passes no worries a quality cycle path nearby.

title: (29610) Ojén -
description: A larger space just before the one on the antenna, much easier to reach and much less scratches on the vehicle due to overgrown vegetation. still nice view :)

title: (29004) Málaga - 4 Camino de la Cizaña
description: Just some rough waste land where vans are now parking due to the other 2 parking places now only for below 2m height restriction. Plenty of vans here parked no problem on flat land right next to the sea & underneath flight path so intermittent noise during the night. Camping forbidden.
